short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gleanbee® [PATENT PENDING] ~ Welcome to Gleanbee® where you can feel at home, find out what the point is, and think straight!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
gleanbee™ Chrome Extension
=========================
 
Discover how you can quickly understand, transform and make time for me-time!
 
A few hours of your life back to you every-time you browse...?
 
Yes! For something you really wanted to do!!
 
"gleanbee™ allows you to remain focused while the content being viewed, at the same time seamlessly glean any interested information into their personal space (gleanbee™ Topic) without any interruptions or context switching!"
 
When you decide to glean (aggregate/ tag) and compile information on a particular topic, a common approach would be to  
use internet,  
document editors, 
copy and paste contents, 
collate the information, 
order, 
validate and then share, 
collaborate with others, 
etc.,
 
It requires you to switch between multiple windows, browsers and applications and collect the necessary information often losing context and focus.
 
gleanbee™ [PATENT PENDING] is to identify and glean the content such as text, image, audio, video from various sources such as web pages, document editors/ viewers, key in word of mouth, SMS, email, internet messenger, social medias etc., in a  shorter  amount of time.
 
At any point of time one or more gleaned content(s) are compiled as a single topic (document) without the help of any editor. You can use the compiled topic to make an educated decision or to share.
 
 Sample use cases:
 ===============

Students searching for study materials
Teaching professionals searching for reference documents
Lawyers searching for some judgement details and/or some news/event details
Doctors searching for medicine details
Medical scribe professionals
IT professionals are searching for code sample, latest gadgets
Tourist searching attractions and hotel details
Individual looking for job/interview preparations
It could be about buying a new/old home 
Searching for an authentic family-owned restaurant
A scientific research on the impact of climate due to increasing pollution 
Or the latest news that a journalist is interested in that would likely be the headlines tomorrow.
